programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Robinson Crusoe on Mars
programme.desc: Commander Kit Draper is forced to crash-land on Mars when his mission goes horribly wrong. He must figure out how to find oxygen, water, and food on the lifeless planet. Duration: 9000

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Without Warning
programme.desc: Sandy and Greg are teenagers who go camping, despite warnings not to, with their friends. They soon encounter aliens, who are using the area as a hunting ground. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Space: Into The Great Beyond
programme.desc: A documentary made sometime in the future by our AI overlord regarding humanity's evolution into a space faring society, has a bit of a surprising twist at the end...yikes! Duration: 5400

programme.title: Day Breaking News
programme.desc: From hotels to orbiting "reefs," the foundations for a burgeoning off-world economy are well underway. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movies- Its a dangerous universe!
programme.desc: The Boogies, SkyFighter and Caronte show that space is a dangerous place. Especially when it lands on the ground. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Cinespace Short Films
programme.desc: A short film competition that offers filmmakers, editors, and animators around the world a chance to share their works inspired by, and using actual NASA imagery. Duration: 10800

programme.title: Astral Travel
programme.desc: Astral Travel is an intentional out-of-body experience that assumes the existence of a soul called an "astral body" that is separate from the physical body and capable of traveling outside it throughout the universe. Duration: 7200

programme.title: GRAVITY
programme.desc: From an undisclosed bunker, Space Channel receives transmissions from our connections in deep space (and deep state). Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel AFTER DARK
programme.desc: A guided tour across the universe on a space ship made of art and sound. Duration: 14400

programme.title: Space Channel AFTER DARK
programme.desc: Join Walter Lloyd on a trip across the cosmos from the night-side of Earth. Duration: 14400

programme.title: Space Channel AFTER DARK
programme.desc: When the sun goes down, Space Channel turns on as the Universe comes alive in a melodic mixtape curated for night owls. Duration: 14400

programme.title: Cosmic Vibrations
programme.desc: A musical and visual celebration of our connection with our home planet and the universe. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Invaders from Mars
programme.desc: A young boy discovers aliens from outer space have landed on Earth. These aliens are under our feet and all around us.. and the floating head has plans for us earthlings! Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: It Came From Outer Space
programme.desc: A spaceship from another world crashes in the rural Arizona desert. An amateur stargazer and a schoolteacher suspect alien influence when the local townsfolk begin to act strange. Duration: 7200

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An Alien lands in Washington D.C. and has a warning for all mankind. He tells the people of Earth that they must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets. Duration: 7200

programme.title: KRONOS
programme.desc: Aliens send a huge robotic accumulator to invade the Earth and absorb all energy it comes in contact with. Duration: 7200

programme.title: SC Movie: Invisible Invaders
programme.desc: Invisible aliens from the Moon invade the Earth by occupying the bodies of the recently deceased. A scientist, his daughter and an army Major, try to fight them. Duration: 7200

programme.title: The Last Push
programme.desc: A tragic accident cuts short the first manned mission to explore life on the moons of Jupiter, Michael Forrest must make the 3 year journey home to Earth in pure solitude. Duration: 7200

programme.title: TrailerPalooza
programme.desc: There are just some space movie trailers that are superior, satisfying and SICK!!!!! Here's a few of our favorites Duration: 3600

programme.title: 20 Million Miles to Earth
programme.desc: The first U.S. spaceship to Venus crash-lands off the coast of Sicily on its return trip. A dangerous, lizard-like creature comes with it and quickly grows gigantic. Duration: 7200

programme.desc: When the sun goes down, Space Channel turns on as the Universe comes alive in a melodic mixtape curated for night owls. Duration: 14400

programme.desc: Sometimes, a picture is worth more than a thousand words... Duration: 1800

programme.title: Our Cosmic Connection to Music
programme.desc: The Big Bang, a video that was conceived and the music composed by Glenna Burmer, covers the 13.8 billion years of our Universe's history, from before the beginning to today. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Dark Star
programme.desc: In the mid-22nd century, mankind has begun to colonize interstellar space. Armed with artificially intelligent Thermostellar Triggering Devices, which can talk and reason, the scout ship Dark Star searches for "unstable planets" which might threaten future colonization. Twenty years into its mission, the Dark Star has aged and suffers frequent malfunctions. Commanding officer Powell has died in one such event, but remains aboard in cryogenic suspension. Lieutenant Doolittle, a former surfer from Malibu, has taken over as commander. The tedium of their work has driven the crew of Pinback, Boiler, and Talby "around the bend", so they have created distractions for themselves. Duration: 7200
